Name: The Fighters Online
About the game: 90s style Indie fighting game The game contains 3 game methods 1- Chapters, contains 2 methods - 2.5D ---------- 6 Levels - 3D -----------6 Levels in Chapters, you will be able to switch the camera to First Person Cam and play 2- Local multiplayer ( 2.5D, 3D) 3- Online ( 3D ) In the Online mode, you are going to face a real person and fight them to get more and more ranks to open your mission and get EXP to build your own character and make him stronger, there are 5 Ranks in the game for each rank you are going to get EXP to build your ability, for each win, you are going to get 2 points if you lost the game, you are going to lose 2 points
